Synopsis: Finds specific data within a given array of strings.
Description: This function searches for a specific text within an array of strings and returns the second element of the string that matches the search criteria.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Find-MyProgramData -Data @("Program A 123", "Program B 456", "Program C 789") -FindText "B"
This example will return "456" as it finds the string containing "B" and returns the second element of that string.
